email_chain.subject: Request for Freight Quote - Iron Ore from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to charter a vessel for the shipment of 150,000 MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Rotterdam. Could you please provide a freight quote for this shipment? We are aiming for a laycan of December 10-15, 2023. Please include any additional details regarding vessel specifications and incoterms.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote - Iron Ore from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer a starting freight rate of USD 25 per metric ton for the shipment of 150,000 MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Rotterdam. The vessel we propose is the MV Ocean Giant, with a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 300 meters. The incoterms would be CFR Rotterdam. Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote - Iron Ore from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 25 per metric ton seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Would you be able to adjust the rate to USD 22 per metric ton? Additionally, could you confirm the laycan dates and provide more details on the vessel's specifications?

Best regards,
Alex Morgan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote - Iron Ore from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I understand your concern regarding the rate. After reviewing the market conditions, I can offer a revised rate of USD 23 per metric ton. The laycan remains December 10-15, 2023. The MV Ocean Giant is equipped with state-of-the-art cargo handling systems and has a clean operational record. Please let me know if this revised rate is acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote - Iron Ore from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We agree to the rate of USD 23 per metric ton. Please proceed with the booking for the MV Ocean Giant with the laycan of December 10-15, 2023. Kindly send over the contract and any additional documentation required for the shipment.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Freight Quote - Iron Ore from Tubarão to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for confirming the rate. I will proceed with the booking and send over the contract and necessary documentation shortly. Please ensure that all required details are filled out and returned at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
